title: Regulation of information flow in cells 2

content.description:
Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin

Information flow in cells can be regulated by various mechanisms.
content.question: Identify TWO environmental factors that increase the mutation rate in an organism, and discuss their effect on the genome of the organism.

frqParts.text: Identify TWO environmental factors that increase the mutation rate in an organism, and discuss their effect on the genome of the organism.
